website_summaries.verdict: Multiple chronograph functions, a durable silicone wristband, and atomic timekeeping mean this high-end model ticks a lot of boxes. Despite the odd flaw, we recommend it for outdoor sports or boating enthusiasts.
pros: Packed with a multitude of chronograph functions
Adjustable silicone band fits most wrists comfortably
cons: Can be difficult to read, as hands lack contrast
Occasional complaints of it being heavy or oversized

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch so much. It is big, heavy, sharp looking and the radio control feature is so cool.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Great new 4th generation skyhawk
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch. I am very satisfied with this purchase. I was a little worried about the size at first but it wears great and looks awesome. The atomic time has synced every night without problem and all the functions make this watch absolutely worth it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the watch but learning all the options takes little time withe owners manual
customer_reviews.author: R D ERICKSON

customer_reviews.title: I love it. The rubber band has multiple adjustment holes
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The rubber band has multiple adjustment holes, no need to cut the band. The eco drive working well. Only thing is the screens for window boxes for home and another city are black back ground with barely visible white letter, it makes difficult to read. Is there anyway to reverse this option to white? Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great outdoor and all around watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a great outdoor and all around watch. Takes a pounding and is heavy duty. Also looks great when on your arm. Love this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Edward P. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive watch!
customer_reviews.text: The watch is as advertised. Looks good on the wrist, comfortable and efficient. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: sean luster

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very functional and the Automatic Time feature keeps exact time.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Drew

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It will much better with power light. It's difficult see the date etc.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's so so heavy and digital window is difficult to read .
customer_reviews.author: suliman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can't get Chicago time he keeps getting me this is a same time I hat won't change
customer_reviews.author: Bucky johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality watch great price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice deatail to this watch I purchased recently since it's on sale I like citizen they make quality watches the band on this watch is very flexible when I recieved the watch and did the box opening it automatically set the time maybe receiving a radio signal
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now
customer_reviews.text: I've had the watch for about three weeks now absolutely beautiful fantastic if you're in the market for a new watch I would highly recommend it cant go wrong with citizen eco drive it's gonna last for years to come
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: GOOD  LOOKING  SPORT  WATCH
customer_reviews.text: this watch is a good looking watch, it give the right time by radio control signal , I like the watch very much, that's the reason I m keeping it, ,,,, the four stars are because only the tips of the hands are luminous, the side is good, the band also very good.
customer_reviews.author: MONTE  CARLO
